thread.title: Tips about Daily Maintenance of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter
thread.title_full: Tips about Daily Maintenance of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter

title: Tips about Daily Maintenance of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter
text: Tips about Daily Maintenance of FOSJOAS Electric Self-balancing Scooter FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter also needs the daily maintenance in order to keep the good performance. There are some tips about the daily maintenance of FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter. China, 21 September 2015 -- Now many people have FOSJOAS scooters. FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter brings along a host of enjoyment and mirth. In process of riding, the rider is exposed to the nature, and the white-collars are no longer dogged by the traffic jam. However, FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter also needs the daily maintenance in order to keep the good performance. There are some tips about the daily maintenance of FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter.The first is to keep FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter away from dust. The dust is easy to enter FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter . The entry of dust into FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter will cause the decrease in performance. If FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter is left aside and it will be used for a long time, it is wise to put a cover on it in order to shield it from dust. The next to prevent FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter from water. If the water penetrates FOSJOAS scooter, it will mar the motor and even cause short-circuit. It is far more serious than the entry of dust in to FOSJOAS scooter. Although FOSJOAS electric intelligent scooter has IP 56, one cannot even be careful more. The leakage of water into FOSJOAS electric self-balancing scooter will lead to a serious issue. Once it happened, the owner have to put it to the repair center for a repair. This is a big inconvenience. Hence the owner of FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter have to be careful about the water leakage. To frequently check the battery power is also a must. If FOSJOAS scooter has not been used for a long time, the battery power might fade away. In order to avoid the blackout halfway, the rider have to have a careful check before using FOSJOAS intelligent self-balancing scooter. If the power is insufficient, the rider should charge it up at once. # # #
